metadata.name: Ixy - Ghost (MEGAMI Origin#16)
metadata.description:
MEGAMI official auction "30 Dreams" is an event that 30 top artists create NFT artworks based on MEGAMI's iconic 30 Origins.

[Ixy](https://twitter.com/Ixy), a prominent illustrator, created the art for "Ghost". He has designed and illustrated for numerous light novels, specialized books, magazines, and games. His charming and colorful characters are eye-catching. 

All bidders will receive a special stamp of "Ghost" emoji as an appreciation from MEGAMI team.
